item.title: Why this Bernie Sanders housing graphic is a chart crime — and what the real data shows
item.description: Even by the data-twisting standards of politicians, Sen. Bernie Sanders’ take on the housing market hits new depths.

item.title: More people are late on both their mortgage and student-loan payments — another bad sign for the economy
item.description: The trends come at a time when the U.S. economy is showing signs of weakness.

item.title: I need $80K to buy my husband out of our home. Do I raid my $180K Roth IRA?
item.description: “I have two young children, and I have a great mortgage rate.”

item.title: My late husband’s employer is forcing me to take 10% 401(k) distributions. Help!
item.description: “A company representative said the account needed to be emptied within a 10-year period.”

item.title: ‘I feel shaken’: A man offered $50 to powerwash my patio. He would not take ‘no’ for an answer.
item.description: I wasn’t interested. I told him, “No thanks.” That didn’t work.
